title: How does a news website earn money or do their businesses? - Quora

response.answer_text: A news website earn their income through many means. Some news websites like News, sport and opinion from the Guardian's US edition | The Guardian. Has a payment info on their site where they ask for donations from readers. Other news websites such as http://www.Gistgh.com. earn their income through placing ads from google and advertising banners from individuals and organizations. Some news websites also charge for featured articles.

Pretty much all media companies make money through advertising. They attract eyeballs. People pay them to put their products in front of those eyeballs. More modern media companies like Google and Facebook make their money the same way.
